name: RSI Momentum Strategy
description: Trading strategy that enters on oversold RSI(<30) and exits on overbought RSI(>70)

fetch_data.name: fetch_data
fetch_data.signature: def fetch_data(symbol: str, start: str, end: str) -> pd.DataFrame

prepare_indicators.name: prepare_indicators
requirements: Return dict with key 'rsi' containing the RSI series

find_entries.name: find_entries
find_entries.signature: def find_entries(df: pd.DataFrame, indicators: Dict[str, pd.Series]) -> List[Dict]
find_entries.description: Find entry signals when RSI crosses below 30
logic: Return list of dicts with: timestamp, price, reason

find_exits.name: find_exits
find_exits.signature: def find_exits(position: Dict, df: pd.DataFrame, indicators: Dict[str, pd.Series]) -> List[Dict]
find_exits.description: Find exit signals when RSI crosses above 70
logic: Return list of dicts with: timestamp, price, reason

run_smoke.name: run_smoke
run_smoke.description: Run smoke test and save entry artifacts

test_skeletons: Test that RSI is calculated correctly
Test that entries trigger when RSI < 30
Test that exits trigger when RSI > 70
Test that no entries when RSI >= 30
Test that no exits when RSI <= 70
